trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown when an XML document cannot be deserialized into a <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile"></xref> by a <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileSerializer"></xref>.

> [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] When the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileSerializer> throws this exception it supplies a message that describes the reason for the exception.

In some cases the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileSerializer> supplies a list of validation errors and warnings that it encountered while trying to deserialize the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>.
The <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileDeserializationException.ValidationEventArgs%2A> property contains this list if it is supplied.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileDeserializationException"></xref> class.

This constructor initializes the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property of the new instance to a system-supplied message that describes the error and takes into account the current system culture.
The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileDeserializationException>.

|Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic)| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|A system-supplied localized description.| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileDeserializationException.ValidationEventArgs%2A>|An empty <xref:System.Collections.IList>.|
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileDeserializationException"></xref> class with a specified error message.
The content of the `message` parameter is intended to be understood by humans.
The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.
The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileDeserializationException>.

|Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic)| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|The error message string.| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileDeserializationException.ValidationEventArgs%2A>|An empty <xref:System.Collections.IList>.|
The message that describes the error.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileDeserializationException"></xref> class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property.

The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property returns the same value that is supplied to the constructor or a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic) if the `innerException` parameter does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor.
The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileDeserializationException>.

|Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|The inner exception reference.| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|The error message string.| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileDeserializationException.ValidationEventArgs%2A>|An empty <xref:System.Collections.IList>.|
The message that describes the error.
The exception that is the cause of the current exception.

If the `innerException` parameter is not a null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic), the current exception is raised in a catch block that handles the inner exception.

Sets the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> object with the collection of <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.ValidationEventArgs"></xref> associated with this exception, and additional exception information.
GetObjectData sets a <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo> with all the exception object data targeted for serialization.
During deserialization the exception object is reconstituted from the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo> transmitted over the stream.
For more information see XML and SOAP Serialization.
A <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> that holds the serialized object data about the exception being thrown.
A <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> that contains contextual information about the source or destination.
info is a null reference ( in Visual Basic)
Gets a list that contains validation warnings and errors associated with this exception.

The <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileSerializer> uses an <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> to deserialize an XML document into a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>.
The <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileSerializer> collects validation errors and warnings emitted by the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>.

At certain points during deserialization, the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileSerializer> determines whether the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> has encountered any validation errors, and, if it has, the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileSerializer> adds these warnings and errors to ValidationEventArgs and throws a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileDeserializationException>.
Not all exceptions of this class will have ValidationEventArgs set.
A <xref:System.Collections.IList> of <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.ValidationEventArgs"></xref> objects that contains validation warnings and errors associated with this exception.
The default is an empty list.
